name: Dr. Albert F. Williams
title: PET GROOMER
about: Dr. Albert Williams grew up on a farm in Lake City, Florida, where he was surrounded by everything from dogs and cats to cattle, horses, pigs, and chickens.

name: Dr. Carina
title: CAT GROOMER
about: Dr. Corina Walton was a little girl, she would constantly tell her father that she wanted to become a dog when she got older.

name: Elizabeth
title: DOG GROOMER
about: Throughout her childhood, Elizabeth’s family always kept at least one cat. Those early experiences with her pets left a permanent impression on her.
